summary: A small mod that adds 3 sets of the Royal Vampire Armor to the guildhall at Castle Volkihar. They include the regular light armor, cloth and heavy varieties and the cuirasses are heavily enchanted for magic users. It is designed to negate the non-regenerative effects of the sun on vampires.
descriptionHtml: A small mod that adds 3 sets of the Royal Vampire Armor to the guildhall at Castle Volkihar. They include the regular light armor, cloth and heavy varieties and the cuirass is heavily enchanted for magic users. It is designed to negate the non-regenerative effects of the sun on vampires. The enchant is essentially the Arch Mage Robe enchant with 100% regeneration to health and stamina as well. There will be a separate file for unenchanted chest pieces. The hoods (separate file) are beneath the other table in the same room. This is a very simple mod so there should not be any bugs but if there are please let me know. Im still working on learning this whole modding business. Enjoy!
author: MidnightSon06

files.name: Royal Daywalker Armor - DawnGuard
files.changelogHtml:
Added an unenchanted version of the original file.
Added a file with hoods to go with the cloth, light and heavy armors.

files.name: Royal Daywalker Armor Hoods
files.changelogHtml:
Added an unenchanted version of the original file.
Added a file with hoods to go with the cloth, light and heavy armors.
